title: Star Guardian Jinx strangely reminds me of
body:
She looks just a bit like

http://pm1.narvii.com/5771/383102194aa616e0c2e4c836c667e95b927e056d_hq.jpg

to me.  I think it's the craziness combined with the pigtails with the dark and light creature things towards the end of said pigtails...

replies.body:
Danganronpa, which is actually a game adapted into an anime/manga.

It was fairly meh but you can blow through the entire series in one sitting if you have about four hours to burn.
Going through the games (and Danganronpa 3's two animes) takes considerably longer.
Ahhhh I hate humans so much, but Rito still makes humanoid champions....
Sorry didnt mean to Offend u. :C

My point really is that Riot is a business.
If they make money off anime references, they're gonna do it, even if they did dislike anime.
